cause.description:
There are millions of people in the world who have no food or water. These people live there lives in shacks and on the streetsas well as villages. many of these people donot have the means to get food to provide for their families. because of this many children either die or are left alone because their parents have died. these children have absolutely no means o fproviding for themselves. we need to help these children ad adults get the food they need so that they stop dying from malnutrition and starvation.
1. having food is a universal right no matter if you are rich or poor.
2. world hunger must be stopped immediately!
3. we have the resorces and the money to help the starving people of the world
cause.mission: feed the starving people of the world.
cause.name: STOP world hunger!
